text: Congratulations to the nine UAMS physicians recognized as Healthcare Research All-Stars! Their dedication to advancing healthcare research is crucial in improving patient outcomes and pushing the boundaries of medical innovation. As a proud liberal, I am thrilled to see the UAMS Hip and Knee surgery team, Orthopaedic surgery team, Gastrointestinal surgery team, and General surgery team among the top percentile nationwide. It's a testament to the power of investing in quality healthcare and research. Let's continue supporting and celebrating our healthcare heroes!
